definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Research on neural stem cells (NSCs) is one of the current hot-spots in neuroscience.
sentences.chinese: 神经干细胞研究是当前神经科学的热点之一。

sentences.english: It's very useful to finding various resources of neurosciences.
sentences.chinese: 对于寻找与神经科学有关的各种资源非常有用。

sentences.english: Dr Murnane is a biologist with particular experience in neuroscience and pharmacology.
sentences.chinese: 生物学家，拥有神经科学和药理学的丰富经验。

sentences.english: In the field of Buddhism and Neuroscience, there exists a point of disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 在佛教和神经科学领域，存在一个分歧点。

sentences.english: A lot of cases with neurology have been proved that left hemisphere is the language dominant hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 大量神经科病例证明语言优势在左侧大脑半球。

sentences.english: The work is in the Journal of Neuroscience.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究刊登在《神经科学》杂志上。

sentences.english: The Neuro-Science and Information-Science are two hotspots in the study of Natural-Science in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 神经科学和信息科学是当今自然科学研究的两大热点。

sentences.english: It is not known whether he has been evaluated by a neurologist recently.
sentences.chinese: 关于他最近是否接受神经科医生的检查，尚不得而知。

sentences.english: The research was published in the Journal of Neuroscience in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究在2005年时由神经科学杂志出版。

sentences.english: Some courses from neural science, psychology, sociology, and education can be applied to the minor as well.
sentences.chinese: 还可以申请辅修神经科学，心理学，社会学和教育学。

sentences.english: The results are published in the latest issue of Journal of Neuroscience.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果发布在最近的一期《神经科学杂志》上。

sentences.english: Doctor Freud was trained as a neurologist.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德医生被培训成为一个神经科专家。

sentences.english: The work is in the Journal of Neuroscience. [Daniel Goldreich et al., citation to come.]
sentences.chinese: 这项工作发表在神经科学期刊上。

sentences.english: This is the website of The Centre for Neuroscience, Flinders University.
sentences.chinese: 这是弗林德斯大学神经科学中心的网站。

sentences.english: Maier is director of the Center for Neuroscience at the University of Colorado at Boulder.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔是科罗拉多大学波尔德分校神经科学中心主任。

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
